CLEARANCE_ALREADY_GRANTED_BAY_N.message: 请求已经接受.前往停靠口 {bay}.

CLEARANCE_DENIED_NO_BAYS.message: 请求驳回.没有空闲的停靠口了.

CLEARANCE_DENIED_TOO_FAR.description: Shown if player requests docking too far away from station
CLEARANCE_DENIED_TOO_FAR.message: 拒绝放行。您的飞船太远，无法验证身份。

CLEARANCE_GRANTED_BAY_N.message: 请求已接受. 前往停靠口 {bay}.

DOCKING_CLEARANCE_EXPIRED.message: 停靠请求已过期.如果仍要停靠必须复述停靠请求.

STATION_GRAV.description: Like an airline pilot announcing local weather conditions

STATION_GRAV_PRESS.description: Like an airline pilot announcing local weather conditions

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_1.message: {playerShipLabel}您正在进入{station}空间.请遵守当地法规.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_3.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_5.message: {playerShipLabel}，欢迎来到{station}。请记住，当您飞越我们的领空时，遵守规定

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_6.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_6.message: {playerShipLabel}，我是{station}STC。你正在进入我们领空，如果你今天不让我填写任何文件，我将不胜感激。

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_3.message: {playerShipLabel}，您已经清除了{station}领空,取消限制.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_4.message: 你正在飞离{station}空间站，{playerShipLabel}让你登出。

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_5.message: {playerShipLabel}，您正在离开{station}空间站。旅途愉快。

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_6.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_6.message: {playerShipLabel}，这是{station}STC。我看到你离开我们的领空，在外面注意安全。
